name: PEOPLElogy Development Sdn Bhd
description: PEOPLElogy Group was founded in 2002 with the goal of helping individuals and businesses thrive by encouraging their employees to identify their inner passions, develop their talents, and implement digitalization tools to measure results. The company’s sustainability lies in its unique learning framework of discovery, development, and digitalization. We have helped over 1,500 corporate clients and developed more than 800 leaders and 42,000 talents in achieving success over the past 20 years. Since its inception 20 years ago, PEOPLElogy Group has developed eight strong brands to facilitate organizations’ embrace of cultural and digital transformation. Our brands include Goal, New Horizons, TALENTS, People 4.0, PEOPLEAPS, Skillsture, and Interactive. As of September 2022, we have grown our workforce to a team of 90 strong and dedicated individuals. We are headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, and have opened three branches in Petaling Jaya, Johor Bahru, and Penang. We are rapidly expanding our business coverage to reach other Southeast Asian countries.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: The Premier people development Group
ShortDescription: PEOPLElogy assists your organization in identifying and capitalizing on its most valuable asset – its employees. Our winning 3D formula of discovery, development, and digitalization will help transform your team into a workforce to be reckoned with.
enhanced_description: PEOPLElogy Development Sdn Bhd, founded in 2002, is a premier people development group dedicated to helping individuals and businesses thrive. Their unique learning framework, the 3D formula, focuses on discovery, development, and digitalization, empowering employees to identify their inner passions, cultivate talents, and utilize digital tools for measurable results. As a growing training solutions provider, PEOPLElogy offers services including training eLearning software and course authoring. Their core objectives include accelerating skill development, improving learning efficiency, and enhancing employee happiness and engagement. With over two decades of experience, they have successfully served more than 1,500 corporate clients and developed over 42,000 talents and 800 leaders, facilitating cultural and digital transformation.
key_use_cases: Development of custom e-learning content via course authoring
Implementation of digitalization tools for performance measurement
competitive_advantages: Unique 'discovery, development, and digitalization' (3D) learning framework
Over 20 years of experience in people development
Proven track record with over 1,500 corporate clients and 42,000+ talents developed
Comprehensive offerings through eight specialized brands addressing cultural and digital transformation
Rapidly expanding business coverage across Southeast Asian countries
Focus on sustainability and social responsibility
implementation_scenarios: Provision of training and development services
Consultation and support for cultural and digital transformation
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
Enhanced organizational success and workforce capabilities
Effective measurement of learning outcomes through digitalization
Transformation of teams into highly capable workforces
primary_users: HR Professionals and Departments (especially L&D managers)
